Package com.vgrs.xcode.util

Contains classes to access data source files, randomly generate test data, log debug info for unit test, and provides an exception class.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Datafile Provides capability to retrieve data from compressed file from system resource or a plain text from local file system.
Debug Log debugging information to System.out/System.err.
RandomData Randomly spit out test data in various encoding type.
XcodeErrorGenerator Generates XcodeError object on the fly.
 

Exception Summary
XcodeException This object embodies all error conditions from the IDN SDK.
 

Package com.vgrs.xcode.util Description

Contains classes to access data source files, randomly generate test data, log debug info for unit test, and provides an exception class.
